browser_error.description: Error mesage shown if the redirection has failed.
browser_error.message: Wasiliana na msimamizi wako wa mfumo.

error_title.description: The title of the redirection page if an error has happened while trying to load the alternative browser.

extension_description.message: Anza kutumia Chrome katika shirika lako huku ukiweza kutumia vivinjari vilivyopitwa na wakati.

learn_more_message.description: Message shown on the bottom with a link to a (potentially) internationalized 'learn more' article
learn_more_message.message: Pata maelezo zaidi kuhusu uwezo wa kutumia kivinjari kilichopitwa na wakati.

redirect_message.description: Text shown on the redirection page while the alternative browser is started.
redirect_message.message: Msimamizi wako wa mfumo amesanidi Chrome ili iweze kufungua kivinjari mbadala ili kufikia $url$.

redirect_title.description: The title of the redirection page. Also shown in the Chrome title bar.

wrong_protocol_error.description: This error is whown when the action page is invoke with a hash tag specifying an address that is not in the http/https protocols.
wrong_protocol_error.message: $url$ haikuweza kufunguliwa kutokana na hitilafu ya itifaki. Tafadhali wasiliana na msimamizi wako wa mfumo.
